com.buralotech.oss.ldapunit

Class DirectoryServerUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buralotech.oss.ldapunit.DirectoryServerUtils

  • final class DirectoryServerUtils
extends Object
    Helper functions to start the in-memory LDAP directory server, load LDAP directory entries from an LDIF files and shut down the in-memory LDAP directory server.
    Since:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private DirectoryServerUtils()
      Hidden constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • startServer

        static com.unboundid.ldap.listener.InMemoryDirectoryServer startServer(DirectoryServerConfiguration annotation)
                                                                throws com.unboundid.ldif.LDIFException,
                                                                       com.unboundid.ldap.sdk.LDAPException,
                                                                       IOException
        Start the directory server using the configuration specified by the DirectoryServerConfiguration annotation.
        Parameters:
        annotation - The configuration.
        Returns:
        The InMemoryDirectoryServer object.
        Throws:
        com.unboundid.ldif.LDIFException - If there was an error in the LDIF data.
        com.unboundid.ldap.sdk.LDAPException - If there was a problem configuring or starting the embedded LDAP directory server.
        IOException - If there was a problem reading the LDIF data.

      • startServer

        static com.unboundid.ldap.listener.InMemoryDirectoryServer startServer(int port,
                                                                       String baseDN,
                                                                       String[] baseObjectClasses,
                                                                       String[] baseAttributes,
                                                                       String authDN,
                                                                       String authPassword,
                                                                       String[] ldifFiles,
                                                                       String[] schemaFiles)
                                                                throws com.unboundid.ldif.LDIFException,
                                                                       com.unboundid.ldap.sdk.LDAPException,
                                                                       IOException
        Create and configure an embedded LDAP directory server, load seed data and start the server.
        Parameters:
        port - The TCP port that the LDAP directory server will be configured to listen on.
        baseDN - The DN that will be configured as the root of the LDAP directory.
        baseObjectClasses - The object classes to use when creating the base DN.
        baseAttributes - The attributes to set on the base DN.
        authDN - The DN that will be configured as the administrator account identifier.
        authPassword - The password that will be configured as the authentication credentials for the administrator account.
        ldifFiles - The LDIF resources or files from which LDIF records will be loaded.
        schemaFiles - The files from which to load custom schemas.
        Returns:
        The InMemoryDirectoryServer object.
        Throws:
        com.unboundid.ldif.LDIFException - If there was an error in the LDIF data.
        com.unboundid.ldap.sdk.LDAPException - If there was a problem configuring or starting the embedded LDAP directory server.
        IOException - If there was a problem reading the LDIF data.

      • getInputStream

        private static InputStream getInputStream(String path)
        Look for path on the classpath or file system and return an InputStream if found.
        Parameters:
        path - The path.
        Returns:
        An InputStream if the path exists on the classpath or file sytem. Otherwise, null.

      • loadSchema

        private static void loadSchema(com.unboundid.ldap.listener.InMemoryDirectoryServerConfig config,
                               String[] schemaFiles)
                        throws com.unboundid.ldif.LDIFException,
                               com.unboundid.ldap.sdk.LDAPException,
                               IOException
        Load a custom schema.
        Parameters:
        config - The directory server configuration.
        schemaFiles - The schema files.
        Throws:
        com.unboundid.ldif.LDIFException - If there was a problem loading the schema into the LDAP directory.
        com.unboundid.ldap.sdk.LDAPException - If there was a problem loading the schema into the LDAP directory.
        IOException - If there was a problem reading the schema from the file.

      • loadData

        private static void loadData(com.unboundid.ldap.listener.InMemoryDirectoryServer server,
                             String ldifFile)
                      throws com.unboundid.ldif.LDIFException,
                             com.unboundid.ldap.sdk.LDAPException,
                             IOException
        Load LDIF records from a file to seed the LDAP directory.
        Parameters:
        server - The embedded LDAP directory server.
        ldifFile - The LDIF resource or file from which LDIF records will be loaded.
        Throws:
        com.unboundid.ldif.LDIFException - If there was an error in the LDIF data.
        com.unboundid.ldap.sdk.LDAPException - If there was a problem loading the LDIF records into the LDAP directory.
        IOException - If there was a problem reading the LDIF records from the file.

      • loadData

        private static void loadData(com.unboundid.ldap.sdk.LDAPConnection connection,
                             InputStream inputStream)
                      throws com.unboundid.ldif.LDIFException,
                             com.unboundid.ldap.sdk.LDAPException,
                             IOException
        Load LDIF records from an input stream to seed the LDAP directory.
        Parameters:
        connection - A connection to the LDAP directory.
        inputStream - TThe input stream from which LDIF records will be loaded.
        Throws:
        com.unboundid.ldif.LDIFException - If there was an error in the LDIF data.
        com.unboundid.ldap.sdk.LDAPException - If there was a problem loading the LDIF records into the LDAP directory.
        IOException - If there was a problem reading the LDIF records from the file.

        Shutdown the embedded LDAP directory server.
        Parameters:
        server - The embedded LDAP directory server.
